TopicTitle: Can't find a forum for the spaceport so...

Articles.Content:
Soooo yeah looks like someone's spamming a plane on the space port in the propulsion section can anyone else see it or is just a glitch for me

Link: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/?paged=2&s=+&subcategories=propulsion second to fourth page
some people just need attention.They think they've built best thing of them all
He might simply be having problems with his upload, thinking it's failed so retrying.

Its a bug when you upload. It says error causing you to resubmit...when in fact its already accepted and each time you submit it submits another duplicate. Worse, the delete funtion does not work. Spaceport is borked.

By the way, the spaceport forum section

Edit:

Fixed.

Edited January 3, 2014 by sal_vager
Yeah guys, when that happens, it's not because people are looking for attention or spammming to spam, that's just the spaceport being buggy.

On 1/3/2014 at 1:54 PM, staf7 said:

Soooo yeah looks like someone's spamming a plane on the space port in the propulsion section can anyone else see it or is just a glitch for me

Link: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/?paged=2&s=+&subcategories=propulsion second to fourth page

Yes, the double post glitch happens all the time.
Whatever this was about seems a moot issue at this point, four years later.
